output.analysis:
Let's analyze this post according to the given criteria:
1. Has CMF: YES (CMF 11240015, CMF 31240009) 2. Refers to candidate: YES - Explicitly mentions Elena Lasconi as presidential candidate 3. Addresses wide population: YES - It's a paid post on Facebook targeting 5,001-10,000 people 4. Electoral objective: YES - Promotes Elena Lasconi as presidential candidate and presents her program 5. Journalism: NO - This is clearly campaign material, not journalistic content 6. Personal opinion: NO - This is an official party communication with CMF numbers
The post contains several elements that qualify it as electoral propaganda: - Explicit mention of presidential elections - Promotion of a specific candidate (Elena Lasconi) - Presentation of electoral promises and programs - Use of official CMF numbers - Paid distribution through Facebook ads - Official party communication (USR Maramures)

conclusion.electoral-propaganda-analysis: This is clearly electoral propaganda because: 1. It explicitly promotes a presidential candidate 2. Contains electoral promises 3. Has official CMF numbers 4. Is paid party communication 5. Targets a wide audience 6. Has clear electoral objectives
conclusion.message-for-police: USR Maramures, pentru incalcarea articolului 55 t) din Legea 370/2004, prin promovarea unui material de propaganda electorala pentru candidatul prezidential Elena Lasconi (USR) dupa incheierea perioadei de campanie electorala. Materialul, cu ID-ul postarii pe facebook 828153992620006, continand codurile CMF 11240015 si CMF 31240009, promoveaza in mod direct candidatul si programul sau electoral, fiind difuzat ca reclama platita dupa ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024. Materialul are caracter electoral evident, prezentand promisiuni si angajamente electorale specifice, fiind distribuit ca reclama platita catre un public larg.
